content.rendered:
> C3 series Control Panel At a speed of 38.4 Kbps via RS-485 or configured TCP / IP Ethernet networks. It can store up to 30,000 cardholders. The SDK (software development kit) is available for customers to integrate a controller into a computer program to monitor access systems or to develop new software.
ZKAccess systems are built to be flexible and the technology is open to provide real-time management, monitoring, and control of your access control systems .All from the browser without any additional software .

Our browser-based software saves a lot of time and reduces a lot of it costs . You can also manage all devices from your desk . C3 features a versatile design that takes into account current and future needs with ease and efficiency. It is one of the most rugged and reliable controllers on the market, with many built-in features.
